profile_positions.description:
The Business Transformation Team will design an implement a new corporate wide Supply Organization, standardized supply chain processes and IT-systems.

In this project I am a senior Supply Chain Process Advisor
profile_positions.title: Special assignment

profile_positions.description:
Location: Global coverage

Responsible for several activities that crosses the 3 typical pillars in Chemical Supply Chain: OTC (Order to Cash), S&OP (Sales & Operations Planning) and L&D (Logistics & Distribution). This together with a team of 6 Supply Chain Process Integration Advisors and 4 Improve Advisors (located in Singapore, Bangkok, Brussels, Rotterdam, Moncton, Curitiba and Houston).

Area of responsibilities include:
- Business owner of serval SaaS contracts (e.g. Aera Technology, Amazon Connect, Celonis, Conexiom, UIPath and ABBYY FlexiCapture). This include items like operational stewardship, budgets, risk assessments and the developments of mitigating actions and sustainability (process documentation, trainings, access administration)
- Chemicals owner of Cyber Security Business Continuity tool
- Development of a global framework to ExxonMobil Chemicals data stored, processed and hosted on the IT systems of our Third Party Service Providers (e.g. trucking companies, warehouses, terminals, Global Freight Forwarders)
- Analytical support (tools, trainings and process improvements)
- Development and implementation of process automation/support tools like RPA and OCR
- Creation of an Operational and Master Data Quality Stewardship structure
profile_positions.title: Global Supply Chain Process Integration Manager

profile_positions.description:
Location: Global coverage

Leading a project team (5 members) who develops a globally consistent end-to-end Customer Service and Supply Chain organisation at the 4 Chemical Business Support Centres. This through the implementation of scalable processes, enabling tools (e.g. RPA and OCR) and empowered talent to better serve our customers and to ensure Chemicals is globally competitive.
profile_positions.title: Global Operations Change Lead

profile_positions.description:
Location: Global coverage

Key Roles and Responsibilities:
-  Act as subject matter expert for all Trucking, Warehousing and Terminalling related business process and supporting tool activities
- Custodian for global end-to-end L&D process documentation
- Defined, prioritized, and lead system enhancements opportunities in concert with ExxonMobil IT organization
- Developed useful key performance indicators and metrics
- Steward analytics and performance results for ExxonMobil Chemical's  supply chain based operations, and 3PL/4PL providers, as a tool to measure efficiency and identify continuous improvement opportunities
- Trained, mentored, coached and developed competency skill sets in the L&D process area, with special focus on on-time-loading, on-time-delivery and service level differentiation
- Ensured L&D best practices are implemented, executed and sustained; maintained and delivered L&D process (Trucking, Warehousing and Terminalling) systems (SAP ECC, SAP TM, SAP EM, carrier portals and slotbooking) training
- Assured compliance with business controls, as well as risk management standards and requirements
profile_positions.title: Global Process Advisor Trucking, Warehousing and Terminalling

profile_positions.description:
Location: Brussels (B) and Houston (US)

Key Roles and Responsibilities:
- Determined the functional requirements for a new global Transportation (SAP TM) and Event Management (SAP EM) Systems.
- Determined the functionality of an automated and integrated slotbooking system and carrier communication portal (Transporeon).
- Identifed and stewarded the associated benefits for all Chemical trucking (liquids/solids, bulk/packed), warehousing and terminalling activities;
- Lead a team of Logistics & Distribution specialists across the globe
- Co-operated with a team of IT specialists for the customization, testing and implementation of the selected systems.
- Implemented new Transportation and Event Management Systems globally

 + Coordinated Logistics Corporate plan developments
